title: Inactivity Error
body: The past 3 days every time I've logged into my account, I've gotten a warning that I would start LP decaying if i didn't play ranked soon BUT i have been playing ranked every day. It's gotten down to 7 days now which is really stressing me out. Especially since i just got plat yesterday. Was hoping to find people with similar problems here, but i didn't find any. Would like to know if anyone is having the same issue though.

replies.body: Make sure that you're playing a game in all the queues that could be decaying. You might be playing Solo matches when it's your Flex rank that's getting ready to decay!
Yeah that was the problem. Thanks for responding so quickly.
